alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 10:58AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Camden County through 1115 AM EDT... At 1057 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Kings Bay Base, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kings Bay Base, Cumberland Island, Harrietts Bluff and Dover Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: For boaters on or near the Intracoastal Waterway, move to a safe shelter now! Do not be caught on or near the water. Gusty winds and choppy waves are likely. Make sure all on board are wearing life jackets.
